EmailTemplate.name: RE: MBO Partners / George Nelson (1354226563.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO Partners / George Nelson (1354226563.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
- - Consultant Services Email - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi George, Thanks so much for the update and for getting back to me. Sounds like a good plan. Our health care plan for 2013 can be found here <http://www.mbopartners.com/mbo-exec-group-benefits-2013>. Please let me know if you have any questions. Thanks,Sara ___________________________________ SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: gedwardnelson@gmail.com [mailto:gedwardnelson@gmail.com] Sent: Tuesday, November 27, 2012 10:05 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: Re: MBO Partners / George Nelson Hi Sara, Glad you wrote. I've been meaning to contact you but kept getting distracted. Yes the contract finally came through about four weeks ago. Since it's the end of the year and I've been unemployed most of the year, I've decided to take the full rate until the year ends. I would like to start using MBO at the beginning of 2013. Another thing I've been meaning to ask is the cost of your health insurance. I'm going to be in the market when my cobra ends in about six months. Thanks again,George
Sent from my iPhone On Nov 27, 2012, at 3:16 PM, "Sara Conde" <sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>> wrote: Hello George, I wanted to touch base as a courtesy and see how the contract search is going. We have a number of consultant resources that we continually update that you may find helpful. You may find them here: http://www.mbopartners.com/resources <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?type=click&enid=bWFpbGluZ2lkPXByb2QtbC01MTImbWVzc2FnZWlkPTUxMiZkYXRhYmFzZWlkPTEzNTE4MTk5NDAmc2VyaWFsPTEyNjUwNzQ0MTImZW1haWxpZD1nZWR3YXJkbmVsc29uQGdtYWlsLmNvbSZ1c2VyaWQ9bC0xMjgtMjYyMDktOTkwMjktMSZleHRyYT0mJiY=&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/resources?mkt_tok=3RkMMJWWfF9wsRonvKjNZKXonjHpfsXx4uwvULHr08Yy0EZ5VunJEUWy2YEDS9QhcOuuEwcWGog8zQ5X>. In addition, if you have any suggestions for new resources that might help other consultants - please let us know! Any update would be great, look forward to hearing from you. Regards,Sara___________________________________Sara Conde Consultant Services AdvisorMBO Partners t: (703) 793-6028f: 703-793-6070e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com> w: www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?type=click&enid=bWFpbGluZ2lkPXByb2QtbC01MTImbWVzc2FnZWlkPTUxMiZkYXRhYmFzZWlkPTEzNTE4MTk5NDAmc2VyaWFsPTEyNjUwNzQ0MTImZW1haWxpZD1nZWR3YXJkbmVsc29uQGdtYWlsLmNvbSZ1c2VyaWQ9bC0xMjgtMjYyMDktOTkwMjktMSZleHRyYT0mJiY=&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=3RkMMJWWfF9wsRonvKjNZKXonjHpfsXx4uwvULHr08Yy0EZ5VunJEUWy2YEDS9QhcOuuEwcWGog8zQ5X>
